title: How do I set my phone to vibrate or mute quickly ï¼Ÿ
answer:
? From the home screen or main menu screen (while the phone is not playing any multi-media file), press and hold the volume down button until the phone enters the vibrate mode. Once in vibrate mode, if you continue to press the volume down button, the phone enters the silent mode.  
? Touch Settings > Sound. To set the phone to vibrate, select Vibrate. To mute the phone, select Ringer Volume, and drag the volume bar to the leftmost position.  
? Press and hold![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111114162339.PNG) key to mute the phone.
